code: import React,{Component}from"react";class UserInput extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={name:""};this.updateName=e=>this.setState({name:e.target.value});this.handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();this.props.addName(this.state.name);this.setState({name:""});};}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",{onSubmit:this.handleSubmit},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Add a new name here...",value:this.state.name,onChange:this.updateName}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"submit",value:"Create Name Tag"}));}}export default UserInput;
